mapper.select: SELECT u.id, u.name, u.nickname, u.email, u.user_role AS userrole, IFNULL(qtyOfBoard, 0) AS qtyOfBoard, IFNULL(qtyOfReply, 0) AS qtyOfReply FROM user u LEFT JOIN ( SELECT user_id, COUNT(id) AS qtyOfBoard FROM board GROUP BY user_id) b ON u.id = b.user_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT b.user_id, COUNT(r.id) AS qtyOfReply FROM board b LEFT JOIN reply r ON b.id = r.board_id GROUP BY b.user_id ) r ON u.id = r.user_id
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET user_role = #{userrole} WHERE id = #{id}
